name: Easy Caller with Mocean
author: MoceanAPI

sections.description:
This plugin enables your web visitors or your customers to interact with your website’s contact number just by entering their number which will then connect them to the endpoint number (the number you set in the “call settings” page). This is a highly efficient and effective way for your customers or web visitor to contact you.

Key Feature

ðŸ‘‰ Easily generate a button shortcode for your visitors to click to dial.

How does it work ?

  1. You’ll need to key in your API Key and API Secret from MoceanAPI Dashboard into our wordpress plugin setting.
  2. You’ll then enter your callback number (usually, is your number)
  3. Generate and Embed shortcode into your WordPress Site.

Adding Easy Caller shortcode is as easy as

[easycall label='Click To Call' number='enter your endpoint number here']

Notice that by default the label for the button is Click to Call which you can change to whatever is the best for you. The second part of the shortcode is the endpoint number that you set up in the “Call Settings” page. Make sure the number is valid.

Now when you have visitors that click on the button, we’ll connect the call between you and your visitor

Try for FREE. 20 trial SMS credits will be given upon registration. Additional SMS credits can be requested and is subject to approval by MoceanSMS.

If you don’t have a Mocean account don’t worry, setting up an account is very simple and you can get your trial credentials in a matter of seconds. Just head over to MoceanAPI and register an account now!

Icons credits
Icons made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com

1.1.0

  • Added analytics

1.0

  • Initial Release
sections.installation:
Using the WordPress dashboard

  1. Log into your WordPress admin dashboard if you have not already done so.

  2. From within your WordPress admin dashboard, hover over Plugins on the left side navigation menu and click on Add New. Within this page, search for “Easy Caller with MoceanAPI”

  3. Once searched, you should be able to find “Easy Caller with MoceanAPI” and at this point just click “install now”.

  4. WordPress will now automatically handle the installation of Easy Caller with MoceanAPI. Once complete, be sure to click Activate Plugin to activate the Easy Caller with MoceanAPI plugin.

short_description: Easy Caller uses Mocean Voice API to connect calls with you and your customers both easily and efficiently.
